data.title: QSL Information Pages
data.text:
11900 WWBS : the owner of the station, Mr. Charles C. Josey verified my report of 19th Dec. from the address : charlesk4lnl[ät]juno.com. He told that he has built himself both the transmitter and the antenna ! The transmitter is 50 kW and mode USB with carrier. The antenna is a 4-element Yagi 140 feet high beamed at 330 degrees. Hours of operation is 0000-0200Z on Sundays and Mondays only M.Ritola-FIN Cumbre DX 223 Jan 99 11900, WWBS, Macon, GA, full-data personal ltr, coverage map, v/s Charles C. Josey. (First one I have seen from them--congrats. (J.Berg)) V.Korinek-AFS Numero Uno 1524 Apr 99 11990 kHz. WWBS, P.O.Box 18174, Macon, Georgia 31209. Certificado QSL y carta. Verificador : Joann Josey. Verifico en 178 dias. M.A.Cornachioni-ARG Conexion Digital 017 Aug 99 WWBS 11900 full data " Certificate " and letter in 2 months after an e-mail follow-up. v/s Jo Ann Josey. G.D.Myers-FL-USA Cumbre DX 255 Aug 99 WWBS 11900 Full-data blue world map 8-1 / 2 X 11 inch certificate plus letter of apology for delay in 9 months for both E-mail & post report with self- addressed stamped envelope (Used). Signer : Jo Ann Josey. W.Flynn-OR-USA Cumbre DX 255 Aug 99 WWBS Macon GA 11900 letter 5½ months. B.Erfjord-NOR Norwegian DX News 1999-07 Aug 99 WWBS, Macon GA 11900 kHz, cert rp : 1, 170 days., heard in Anstruther, Fife, Scotland J.Parker-G WDXC QSL Report Aug 99 11900 kHz. WWBS, P.O. Box 18174, Macon, Georgia 31209. Certificado QSL y carta. Firmante de la verificacion : Jo Ann Josey. Demora de 6 meses. A.L.Slaen-ARG Conexion Digital 018 Sep 99 WWBS : 11.900 f /d certifivate and personal letter in 252 days for $ 1.00. v/s Jo Ann Josey. R.Comeau-MA-USA direct to QIP Sep 99 11900, WWBS, 8-1 / 2x11 " certificate with blue map of world And large " WWBS, " and " This is to certify that Jerry Berg has successfully heard and sent a signal report to our station located at 11.9 MHz on Dec. 19, 1998 at 00 : 09 UTC. This certificate is to show our appreciation for your help and support. WWBS Radio, Macon, Georgia, USA. " v/s Jo Ann Josey. Accompanying ltr said that " in all the mail we over looked your ltr. " Three mos. after follow-up, 8 + mos. total. J.Berg-MA-USA Numero Uno 1542 Sep 99 WWBS 11900 kHz v/s : Charles C.Josey (Molander, USA, QSL Report, May 1999, Naswa, USA) ?.Molander-USA Play-DX 1037 Sep 99 WWBS 11900, f /d verie certificate and personal letter in 252 days for US $ 1 from v/s Jo Ann Josey. R.Comeau-MA-USA CIDX 1999-10 Okt 99 11900, WWBS, Full-data QSL certificate in 11 mos., apologizing for delay, after E-mail follow-up sent two mos. ago. v/s JoAnne Josey. E.Kusalik-AB-CAN Numero Uno 1552 Nov 99 11900, WWBS, full-data ltr, v/s Charles C. Josey, Stn Engineer, in one mo. Says WWBS is now beamed 30 degrees to Europe at 0000-0200 Sat & Sun, formerly 1100-1200 Sat & Sun to Aus & NZ. Also, the address in the 1999 WRTH is the address of the xmtr site and mail delivery there is not reliable. Use address : WWBS, 965 Hickory Ridge Drive, Macon, GA 31024 USA. Return postage is greatly appreciated. J.Talbot-AB-CAN Numero Uno 1552 Nov 99 Im Gegensatz zur seltsamen QSL Politik ihrer georgischen Kollegen von WGTG hat WWBS erfreulicherweise eine DXer freundlichere Haltung. Ein QSL Zertifikat mit allen Details kam nach knapp 3 Monaten von : WWBS, Box 18174, Macon, Ga 31209, USA (v/s Jo Ann Josey). Die Station ist regelmaessig am Wochenende (SA / SO ab 00.00 UTC) auf 11900 kHz aufzunehmen. WWBS steht uebrigens fuer " World Wide Broadcast System ". E.Glantschnig-SUI A-DX-ML Feb 00 WWBS 11900 kHz QSL CERTIFICATE FOR MINT STAMPS, 170d. v/s : JO ANN JOSEY SEGR. QTH : P. O. BOX 18174, MACON, GA. 31209. C.Rooms-G Play-DX 1060 Mrz 00 WWBS 11900 Macon, GA f/d blue 'Certificate' in 15 months ! v/s : Jo Ann Josey. T.Palmersheim-MT-USA HCDX-ML Apr 00 WWBS Macon GA 11900 letter sertifikat 371d. v/s Jo Ann Josey T.-H.Ekblom-DNK Norwegian DX News 2000-04 Apr 00 11900, WWBS, verie ltr from v/s Charles C. Josey (Stn Engineer and Operator) saying that with their b / c time change to 0000-0200, he doesn't think I will be able to hear them anymore. Might be right. Enclosed interesting field strength maps. 25 wks. for 2 IRCs. D.Foster-AUS Numero Uno 1572 Apr 00 11900, WWBS (" World Wide B / C System "), full-data certificate in 116 days, with a short personal ltr apologizing for the delay in responding, signed by Jo Ann Josey. R.D'Angelo-PA-USA Numero Uno 1575 Apr 00 WWBS 11900 kHz, letter, rp : $1 420 days. J.Parker-G WDXC QSL Report Apr 00 WWBS 11900 MACON, REPLY AFTER 1 YEAR ! v/s : JO ANN JOSEY, SECRETARY. (DISTANCE N*19 / 1999, SWEDEN) B.Fransson-S Play-DX 1066 Apr 00 WWBS 11900 kHz 1 YEAR. G.Bellabarba-I Play-DX 1074 Jun 00 WWBS 11900 kHz QSL CERTIFICATE 112d. Sent MINT stamps.v/s : JO ANN JOSEY. QTH : P.O.BOX 18174, MACON GA. 31209. H.-D.Buschau-D Play-DX 1074 Jun 00 Die nur selten gemeldete Station WWBS bestätigte den 1999 geglückten Empfang auf 11900 kHz nach 307 Tagen mit QSL-Zertifikat im A4-Format. v/s Jo Ann Josey. Rp waren 2 US-Dollar. Die Station konnte damals nur für zwei Stunden wöchentlich in der Nacht vom Sonnabend zum Sonntag bei guten Bedingungen auch in Europa geloggtt weiden. Derzeitiges Sendeformat läßt sich für Interessenten vielleicht per Kontaktaufnahme herausfinden. Adr. : WWBS, World Wide Broadcast System, 300 Poplar Street, P.O. Box 18174, Macon, GA. 31209 Telefon Charles Josey 912-745-9485 Jo Ann Josey 912-745-9226 J.Adolph-D Eastside DX 11 Aug 00 WWBS Macon GA 11900 b dipl 275d. K.Norlin-S Norwegian DX News 2000-10 Dez 00 Jetzt kam noch ein QSL-Nachzügler aus den USA : 11900 WWBS bestätigte per Zertifikat einen Bericht vom April 2000. v/s Jo Ann Josey. Laufzeit also rund 9 Monate. H.Kuhl-D A-DX-ML Jan 01 WWBS QSL : Kam bei mir auch heute, Laufzeit 319 Tage. Vorhin hatte ich mit Andree Bollin telefoniert, bei ihm trudelte die QSL auch heute ein. Die gute Frau arbeitet wohl den Rückstand ab. M.Elbe-D A-DX-ML Jan 01 WWBS QSL : Kam heute auch bei mir an. RR vom Juni 2000. Beigelegt persönliches Entschuldigungsschreiben. R.Sonntag-D A-DX-ML Jan 01 WWBS 11900, f /d Certificate and personal letter in 9 months for US stamps. v/s Jo Ann Josey. M.Delmage-AB-CAN HCDX-ML Jan 01 11900, WWBS, Macon, GA, full-data sheet in 13 mos., from Jo Ann Josey. C.Lobdell-MA-USA Numero Uno 1613 Jan 01 WWBS, v/s Jo Ann Josey 11900 kHz, cert rp : no, 116 days. R.D'Angelo-PA-USA WDXC QSL Report Jan 01 WWBS Macon / 11900, 361 days, detailed letter, personal letter / 2 IRC. K.-P.Hilger-D ADDX-Kurier 2001-03 Feb 01 WWBS 11900, f /d Certificate and personal letter in 9 months for US Stamps from v/s Jo Ann Josey. M.Delmage-AB-CAN CIDX 2001-02 Feb 01 WWBS 11900 kHz Full data QSL sheet and letter with apologies for delay, from Jo Ann Josey in 8 months for $ 1 U.S. N.Pimblett-AB-CAN CIDX 2001-02 Feb 01 WWBS 11915 Nice big A4 certificate thanks for report, and letter apologies for delay. 8 months for 1USD and p / card. J.Wright-AUS Cumbre DX 332 Feb 01 WWBS Macon GA 11900 k b 1år. v/s Jo Ann Josey K.-E.Stridh-S Norwegian DX News 2001-02 Feb 01 WWBS Macon / 11900, 290 days, det. QSL-certificate / IRC. H.Wolff-D ADDX-Kurier 2001-06 Mrz 01 WWBS Macon / 11900, 109 days, detailed letterlatt, B / $; v/s Jo Ann Josey. J.Waga-D ADDX-Kurier 2001-06 Mrz 01 WWBS Macon, GA 11915. Die Karte brauchte 190 Tage für 1$ J.Stiller-D direct to QIP Mrz 01 WWBS Macon GA 11910,00 kHz, 1 US-$, - 30 Tage, QSL-Karte, Details : ja. S.Schliephacke-D EAWRC Bulletin 286 Mrz 01 WWBS Macon 11900,00 kHz, 1 IRC, AK Report in Englisch, 327 Tage, B, Zertifikat Details : ja. Z.Elias-CZE EAWRC Bulletin 287 Apr 01 WWBS, v/s Joann Josey 11915 kHz, card, rp : no, 228 days. C.Elliott-TAS-AUS WDXC QSL Report Apr 01 WWBS Macon / 11915 kHz, 209 days, detailed qsl-letter, pers. letter / $. R.Sonntag-D ADDX-Kurier 2001-12 Jun 01 Radio WWBS 11900,00 kHz, 1 US-$ E 337 days, A4-QSL, qsl-letter, ja. P.Robic-AUT EAWRC Bulletin 290 Jul 01 WWBS 11900 GIANT CERTIFICATE + letter IN 161d. SENT 1 $ USA. V/s: JO ANN JOSEY Secretary. QTH : P.O.BOX 18174, MACON, GEORGIA, ZIP*31209. A.Fernández Llorella-E Play-DX 1120 Aug 01 WWBS 11900 QSL-CERTIFICATE & letter. N.Reiner-D Play-DX 1120 Aug 01 WWBS 11910 kHz - 965 Hickory Ridge Dr. - Macon GA 31204.1018 - USA con QSL e lettera in 27 giorni. V/s Charles C. Josey. 1 IRC (via R.Scaglione) R.Pavanello-I BCL-News-ML Jul 02 WWBS Macon GA 11910, card, letter & cover map in 2 weeks Rp: US$, L.Weirell-S direct to QIP Aug 02 WWBS 11910 kHz QSL-LETTER 27 d. SENT 1 IRC. V/s: CHARLES C. JOSEY (Gen.MANAGER) ADDRESS : 965 HICKORY RIDGE DRIVE, ZIP-31204-1018 MACON, GE. R.Pavanello-I Play DX 2003 Apr 03

I finally received a reply September 19 from WWRB - via email. It was in response to my latest follow-up report on September 16. Here it is: "This is to confirm the reception report of WWRB. Sorry for the delay in the QSL response; we are still under the construction of station WWRB and all efforts are diverted to this since the FCC only gives a certain amount of allotted time." (via rec.radio.shortwave) M.B.Carroll-USA Cumbre DX-ML Sep 2002 QSL from WWRB : I got a QSL card from Grace in Action Ministries, P O Box 11569, Honolulu, Hawaii 96828, USA, where they in detail certify that I heard WWRB, Manchester, TN, USA on 6890 kHz. V/s was illegible. B.Fransson-S HCDX-ML Sep 2002 Hi there, one surprise QSL arrived: 5085, Radio WWRB, Manchester, TN - nice card with all details in 48 days, from/via Grace In Action Ministries, P. O. Box 11569, Honolulu, Hawaii 96828, USA- my 35th USA QSL on SW. hi T.-H.Ekblom-DNK DXLD 2-171 Nov 2002 WWRB 5085 k 48 days T.-H.Ekblom-FIN Norwegian DX News 2002-07 Nov 2002 It seems like the only way to get WWRB verified is to write to the different program makers. A direct report to the station will not result as Dave Franz doesnt seems to like us DX-ers according to the WWRB web site A hobby listener can be likened to a trophy hunter; they listen to a station for a short period of time, send in to the station a reception report, request a QSL card (proof of reception card,) and are rarely heard from again, unless the station makes a radical change to its QSL card design or hosts a reception report contest, offering station related paraphernalia such as pennants. The hobbyist is only interested in getting something nifty from his efforts and pays little, if any, attention to the programming, other than the writing of a brief transcript, required to prove reception. Also like a trophy hunters guns, hobby listeners usually posses powerful receiving equipment to pick up even the weakest signals, so shortwave stations often attempt to pass hobbyist reception reports off as proof of world coverage (Beware!) L.Weirell-S HCDX-ML Okt 2003 Part 1: Estupendo Certificado QSL he recibido de World Wide Religious Broadcasting, Short Wave Radio Station WWRB, Box 7, Manchester,Tennessee 37349, USA. La respuesta ha demorado poco más de un año, el reporte incluyendo casete con la grabación de la escucha realizada el 19/03/03 en 5050 kHz fue enviado el 21 de abril de 2003 y la QSL arribó el día 30 de mayo de 2004. La enorme tarjeta mide 28 cm de largo x 21,5 cm de alto, está diseñada con un fino recuadro, en el centro va inscripto el nombre del oyente como Listener Club Member y tiene previsto catorce lugares a completar con dos autoadhesivos dorados que la emisora remite verificando cada informe de recepción (siete en total), R.Guillermo Margenet-ARG Conexion Digital 262 Mai 2004 Part 2: uno indica el modo de transmisión y el otro el transmisor utilizado y la frecuencia, se verifica el día en forma manuscrita pero no el horario de la escucha. El verificador es DAVID FRANTZ. El Certificado QSL lleva el número SW-00000 3 (!!!). La dirección web de WWRB es www.wwwrb.org La recepción fue realizada con un receptor Kenwood R-5000 y antena T2FD de 27 metros. R.Guillermo Margenet-ARG Conexion Digital 262 Mai 2004 WWRB bestätigt jetzt direkt! Neben der indirekten Bestätigung von WWRB durch Dr. Fulcher, inklusive Mitgliedschaft und Ausweis für seinen Global Shortwave Club (Danke für den Tipp an Rudolf Sonntag hier in der Liste!) habe ich fast zeitgleich eine direkte Bestätigung erhalten! Heute lag im Briefkasten tatsächlich ein großes Kuvert aus Manchester TN mit einem sehr dekorativen ca. DIN A4 großem Zertifikat aus Karton. Es war unterzeichnet von David Frantz (!) persönlich und beklebt mit jeweils einem goldenen Sticker "Amplitude Modulation" und "Global-1 5.085 MHz". Es bietet Platz für weitere "gold seals" die man für künftige Empfangsberichte erhält. Anscheinend hat man bei WWRB seinen "Kampf gegen Dxer" aufgegeben und die QSL Politik um 180 Grad gedreht! Auch die Anti-DXer Seiten auf der Homepage von WWRB sind ja bereits verschwunden! Vieleicht hat ja auch Dr. Fulcher, selbst seit 20 Jahren DXer, seinen Einfluss als Kunde von WWRB geltend gemacht? R.Bessler-D A-DX-ML Jun 2004 5050 kHz WWRB (World Wide Religious Broadcasting), Manchester, TN. Recebido: Certificado de escuta, com número de associado (SW 0000.96 - Listener Club Member). 574 dias. V/S: Angela Frantz. QTH: Box 7, Manchester, TN 37349-0007, United States of America. R.Walter Grimm-SP-B Atividade DX 205 Jun 2004 I received a full-sized WWRB certificate in todays mail, for a report sent in September, 2002. Can someone refresh my memory, please? Was this the station that once wouldnt acknowledge listener reports directly, and had information on the website that DX reports were of no value to the station or their clients? Or have I confused them with another operation? G.Bishop-FL-USA Cumbre DX-ML Jun 2004 WWRB, 6890, f/d certificate, same one making the rounds in various DXers mailboxes, w/ stickers indicating transmission mode and frequency. This in 856 days for SASE (not used). V/S, Angela Frantz. What's up with the new DXer/QSL friendly attitude at WWRB? S.R.Barbour Jr.-NH-USA Cumbre DX-ML Jun 2004 TN 12.170 WWRB Manchester, Enormous QSL certificate in 100 days for station at 12.170 MHz. v/s:Angela Frantz. (I usually don't include my SW QSLs, but I'm listing this one only because WWRB has been adamant about not QSLing in the past, which I didn't discover until after I sent my report. Obviously something made them have a change of heart somewhere...) E.Berger-MI-USA DX-MidAmerica 2004-06 Jun 2004 12172, WWRB, Tennessee, good-looking numbered certificate QSL from this former non-verifier, same as being rcvd by others. Date and fqy, with stickers for fqy and mode, and space for stickers to be issued for other rpts. V/S Angela Frantz. In 29 mos., no follow-ups. J.Berg-MA-USA DXplorer-ML Jun 2004 WWRB: 12.172 P/D cardboard 8&1/2 x 11 QSL in 891 days (2 & 1/2 years!).V/S Angela Frantz.QSL indicated that subsequent reports sent to WWRB Box 7, Manchester, TN 37349 "will result in the issuance of additional gold seals," etc. Very nice cd, sounds like they are interested in reception reports. R.Comeau-MA-USA DXplorer-ML Jun 2004 WWRB 5050 f/d certificate in 10 mos after f/up. S.Paszkiewicz-WI-USA DXplorer-ML Jun 2004 Received (after 2 years) a VERY nice QSL certificate from WWRB, 5.085 MHz, for standard reception report and stamp. Address: WWRB, Box 7, Manchester, TN 37349. Certificate says that a new set of Gold seal(s) will be issued for each additional report (up to one set of seals per week). I assume the SWL would then put them on the certificate. Very nice idea! B.Combs-NM-USA HCDX-ML Jun 2004 WWRB - 12172 diploma after 1.5 years L.Weirell-S direct to QIP Jun 2004 5050 kHz WWRB (World Wide Religious Broadcasting), Manchester, TN. Recebido: Certificado de escuta, com número de associado (SW 0000.96 - Listener Club Member). 574 dias. V/S: Angela Frantz. QTH: Box 7, Manchester, TN 37349-0007, United States of America. R.Walter Grimm-SP-B Atividade DX 207 Jul 2004 WWRB no 6890 kHz, det/c 140 days, (This certificate is issued by Shortwave Radio Station WWRB to Listeners Club members(?) as confirmation of the transmitter, mode and QRG indicated by the gold seals affixed to this certificate on the date indicated below each seal. (www.wwrb.org) Certificate No. 000210) P.Gager-AUT BDXC-UK 2004-07 Jul 2004 12172 WWRB Informe enviado el 01 de abril del 2002, por la escucha realizada en los 12172 kHz, a las 23.00 UTC. VRS/ Angela Frantz. Muy bonito Certificado QSL con stickers dorados por cada escucha. Tengo el numero SW 00295 del Club de Oyentes. C.Pérez Dioses-PRU Conexion Digital 273 Jul 2004 Radio WWRB 5085 kHz, 25 Tage, det. Karte, Infos from Global Short Wave Club President Dr. E.C. Fulcher, Jr, Mitgliedskarte / 3 Dollar D.Kraus-D direct to QIP Jul 2004 5085 WWRB, World Wide Religious Broadcasting,Box 7, Manchester, TN 37349-0007,United States of America; Big QSL Certificate Number SW-000094 in 14 months. V/S: Angela Frantz A.Leonel Slaen-ARG Dxlandia-ML Jul 2004 WWRB, 12172 kHz, Recently reported nice certificate (this one SW- 322) in 10 days for $1 and addr label (used). V/s Angela Frantz. J.L.Sgrulletta-NY-USA DXplorer-ML Jul 2004 WWRB $1 6870 kHz, cert 29 month, J.Parker-G BDXC-UK 2004-08 Aug 2004 WWRB 5085 kHz, detailed QSL-certificate with stickers for transmission mode, transmitter and frequency in 49 days for 1 $. v/s Angela Frantz. R.Sonntag-D direct to QIP Aug 2004 5050, WWRB verified with its World Wide Religious Broadcasting certificate indicating "Global-5" transmitter in 29 days from v/s Angela Frantz. Certificate Number: SW-000325. R.D'Angelo-PA-USA DXplorer-ML Aug 2004 WWRB / ? kHz, 611 Tage, QSL-Zertifikat J.Leyder-LUX ADDX 2004-18 Sep 2004 WWRB / 5085 kHz, 49 Tage, det. DIN-A4-QSL-Zertifikat / $ R.Sonntag-D ADDX 2004-20 Okt 2004 WWRB no return postage 5085 kHz, cert 45 days, (Large 28x21 cm Cert.) P.Cody-IRL BDXC-UK 2004-10 Okt 2004 WWRB / 5050 kHz, 54 Tage, Brief / $ D.Rosenau-D ADDX 2004-23 Dez 2004 WWRB Manchester, TN 6890 kHz, full data certificate, 28 weeks, v/s Angela Franklin, WWRB, Box 7, Manchester, TN 37349, USA G.Huijbens-BEL direct to QIP Jan 2005 WWRB 5085 kHz A4 certificate, 33 day for 1 $, addr: Box 7, Manchester TN 37349, USA H.-D.Buschau-D direct to QIP Jan 2005 WWRB, Manchester, TN, 5085, partial data certificate in 55 weeks. V/s Angela Frantz. V.Korinek-AFS DXplorer-ML Jun 2005 WWRB Manchester / 6890 kHz, 78 Tage, det. A4- Zertifikat / $ E.Röscher-D ADDX 2005-10 Okt 2005 WWRB Manchester / 5050 kHz, 70 Tage, det. QSL-K, B / IRC, AK H.Wolf-D ADDX 2005-10 Okt 2005 WWRB 5050 kHz. QSL Certificate in 244 days. V/s: David Franz. Address: WWRB, P.o.BOX 7, ZIP*37349 Manchester, TN. S.M.Kolesov-UKR Play-DX 2006-01 Jan 2006 WWRB / 5085 kHz, 153 Tage, QSL-Diplom / $ W.Kaiser-D ADDX 2006-08 Aug 2006
